I never expected to write this here, but whoa guys.. spoilers

The South Korean Webtoon (Webcomic) scene has been booming in the last few years. I am happy to see that the Koreans are also embracing NTR. I have read all 582 pages of this gallery before I came to post my comment. The art style is quite nice as it is pleasing to the eyes. However, the lack of diversity of the bulls makes my heart sink. Their should be an elder bull to show the younger bulls the ropes. This elder bull would be an ex-marine African-American man that has the thickest blackest cock. 😍 This is needed as today the world is on fire. A BBC could unite all of the bulls and their cuckolds will be overjoyed with the new skills that they develop. The women in this work will feel like they are experiencing an earthquake in bed after their bulls are taught the art of the BBC. I am truly happy that the comments have come black after being gone for so long. I know that my fellow NTR-heads miss the intellectual discussions that we had in the works that we hold dear to our hearts.
@Zerobero12 sounds like whoever made this is quite the fucked up person themselves. Also wtf happens with the mc after all that.
Once you experience the ntr that breaks you, after recovering you'll like ntr much better. Atleast thats what happened to me

@Zerobero12 I agree with you man and good you corrected him about white hair girl. He is just a freaking asshole in this story. Well you can read this story in MC perspection for very hot sex scenes in it. Chapter 39 is probably hottest in that manhwa, but also sad at the end. I'll wait english just for that arc around chapter 39 because it was freaking hot.
I as the great MIXAILIDIS,declare this monstrosity as illegal,gay and cuck friendly. All NTR fags need to get gassed

HornyHammer,wrong!He make the white hair girl get gangraped and cause her to commit suicide.And he also the cause his crush get killed by her husband because of jealousy.The girls he fucked with he abandoned them when they swore their loyalty to him and pregnant with his child.Also,he also the cause his 'friend'marriage split apart.This comic is total garbage.The mc is a total asshole and deserved to be killed.Not recommend.
It was so nice when the comments were disabled and I ain’t have to see cringy terms like vanillafag n shit. Good manhwa tho

Unlike the other trash NTR manhwas,this one is a gold and I'll say this that I loved this one 10/10.Read the raws and I'll say this that the MC has revenge on the bitch who cucked on him when he was in HS and he goes on to propose his GF(the white haired girl),most works from this author is rather wholesome and has gud endings for an adult,drama manhwa so I recommend this one.Unless you're a pure vanillafag and want hand holding fuck off smh
